data.movieDescription: As the First Order rises to power, a scavenger and a defecting stormtrooper find themselves on a quest for the lost Luke Skywalker. Their journey ignites a new conflict between the Resistance and the dark forces threatening to consume the galaxy.

A team of elite mercenaries is hired to overthrow a ruthless dictator in a small South American country. They soon find themselves caught in a dangerous web of deceit and betrayal, realizing their target is merely a puppet for a powerful rogue CIA agent.

A railway coolie, separated from his family by a vengeful man, rises to become the leader of his fellow porters. He embarks on a quest for justice and to reunite with his loved ones, ultimately confronting the very forces that tore his family apart.
After crash landing into a Alien planet, robinsons family fights all the odds to survive and escape.
